attributes.action: recognise the bravery of Captain Peter Burkill and First Officer John Coward
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The recent crash landing of British Airways flight 038 at London's Heathrow Airport, demonstrated the tremendous skill and bravery of both pilots who so narrowly averted a tragedy.

One hundred and fifty-two passengers, as well as those travelling on the adjacent road and those residents living nearby; are all alive, today, thanks to the actions of both pilots.

Prime Minister; as recognition for the bravery of both pilots, in the face of overwhelming danger, we respectuffly request you to consider both men to be awarded the George Cross.
